Key Match Events: Zack Wheeler fired seven scoreless innings in a 3-0 Phillies win.
Each team robbed a home run from the other.
The Phillies have won 31 straight games when their starter has gone seven innings.
Post-Match Reflections: Phillies manager Rob Thomson praised Wheeler's command and execution under pressure.
Nick Castellanos highlighted Wheeler's consistent performance and understated personality.
Wheeler expressed his desire to win the Cy Young Award and his focus on personal goals to help the team.
Braves manager Brian Snitker acknowledged Wheeler's difficulty to beat and the strategy to elevate his pitch count.
Wheeler reflected on the electric atmosphere and his pride in performing in big games and moments.
